Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system." Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward. Back then, there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons. Nor does Donald Rumsfeld register second thoughts about the Pentagon's crucial failure to capture Osama bin Laden in the battle of Tora Bora in December 2001.
